attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our government is imprisoning parents because their children are truanting and not getting a proper education and yet as parents of special needs children the authorities are denying our children a proper education. We are having to fight to get our children properly educated.Please amend the special needs education statute and make it easier to get a proper education for our children.
EDUCATION IS A RIGHT NOT A FIGHT.

rejection.details:
Dear Rosemarie

Please accept our apologies, as we should have said in the first instance, that there are already 2 live petitions regarding special needs education. 

These are:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/sneeds-schools/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/tinapiggy/

We try not to duplicate on the site and cannot therefore accept your petition. 

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
